json_to_edit.voice_over: In the realm between worlds, a beacon of hope shines through the mist.
json_to_edit.description: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a spectral fog.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, distant foghorn, whispers in the wind
json_to_edit.name: Lighthouse of Lost Souls
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Elias tends to the lighthouse, guiding Marina and Finn towards redemption.

qa.action: A majestic lighthouse stands tall on rugged cliffs, piercing through dense fog.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the winding staircase, his lantern casting dancing shadows.

tr.action: The Captain meticulously cleans the massive lighthouse lens, his weathered hands working with practiced precision.

xc.sfx_keywords: whispers in the wind, soft footsteps
xc.action: Marina's ethereal form materializes at the base of the lighthouse, her eyes fixed on the beacon above.

ka.action: Finn's ghostly ship emerges from the fog, drawn to the lighthouse's powerful beam.

fn.action: Captain Elias encounters Marina on the lighthouse balcony, his eyes widening in recognition.

af.action: Finn's face appears in the ship's porthole, a mix of hope and fear in his eyes.

qo.action: The lighthouse beam sweeps across the turbulent sea, illuminating Finn's approaching vessel.

fp.action: Finn climbs a spectral ladder from his ship to the lighthouse rocks, reaching for Marina's outstretched hand.

va.action: The lighthouse lens flares brightly as Captain Elias, Marina, and Finn stand together, bathed in its redemptive light.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: In the realm between worlds, a beacon of hope shines through the mist.
updated_json.description: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a spectral fog.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, distant foghorn, whispers in the wind
updated_json.name: Lighthouse of Lost Souls
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Elias tends to the lighthouse, guiding Marina and Finn towards redemption.

qa.action: A majestic lighthouse stands tall on rugged cliffs, piercing through dense fog.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the winding staircase, his lantern casting dancing shadows.

tr.action: The Captain meticulously cleans the massive lighthouse lens, his weathered hands working with practiced precision.

bx.action: The camera soars around the lighthouse, revealing its isolated position on the misty coastline.

xc.sfx_keywords: whispers in the wind, soft footsteps
xc.action: Marina's ethereal form materializes at the base of the lighthouse, her eyes fixed on the beacon above.

ka.action: Finn's ghostly ship emerges from the fog, drawn to the lighthouse's powerful beam.

fn.action: Captain Elias encounters Marina on the lighthouse balcony, his eyes widening in recognition.

yz.action: The camera follows Marina as she glides through the lighthouse, her presence stirring long-forgotten echoes.

af.action: Finn's face appears in the ship's porthole, a mix of hope and fear in his eyes.

qo.action: The lighthouse beam sweeps across the turbulent sea, illuminating Finn's approaching vessel.

fp.action: Finn climbs a spectral ladder from his ship to the lighthouse rocks, reaching for Marina's outstretched hand.

lm.action: The lighthouse towers above, its light pulsing with increasing intensity as the three souls draw closer together.

va.action: The lighthouse lens flares brightly as Captain Elias, Marina, and Finn stand together, bathed in its redemptive light.

label.rationale: we will add new shots after every three existing shots in the scene, as requested by the edit command. this will increase the total number of shots from 10 to 13. we'll insert creative and fitting shots that complement the existing scene without altering any other elements. the new shots will be added after the third, sixth, and ninth shots in the current order. we'll update the list_display_order and add the new shots to the dictionary, using random two-letter keys for each new shot.

value.action: The camera soars around the lighthouse, revealing its isolated position on the misty coastline.
The camera follows Marina as she glides through the lighthouse, her presence stirring long-forgotten echoes.
The lighthouse towers above, its light pulsing with increasing intensity as the three souls draw closer together.
